changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('High','Intermediate','Low','Susceptible') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'AZATANAVIR/r(Resistance)');

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN("AZATANAVIR/r(Resistance)", "DARUNAVIR/r(Resistance)", "FOSAMPRENAVIR/r(Resistance)", "INDINAVIR/r(Resistance)", "LOPINAVIR/r(Resistance)", "NELFINAVIR/r(Resistance)", "SAQUINAVIR/r(Resistance)", "TIPRANAVIR/r(Resistance)") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Test Genotypage');

changeSet.comment: Adding New Tests to pannel Test Genotypage
